title: Holy Shit, That Was The Biggest Screwup In Oscars History! See The Best & Most Shocked Twitter Reactions! | PerezHilton.com
text:
"I knew I would screw this show up, I really did."
That was host Jimmy Kimmel 's response to what will go down as the biggest screwup in Oscars history!
Film legend Warren Beatty was apparently handed the WRONG DAMN envelope and announced La La Land won Best Picture ‚Äî when in actuality it was Moonlight !
But what did viewers have to say? See the biggest, best, most shocked Twitter reactions (below)!
When Emma Stone realizes the twist ending #Oscars #BestPicture pic.twitter.com/nkm1nDLnmE
